welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.content:
Welcome to mineflayer-autocrystal üëã

> mineflayer-autocrystal is a plugin that lets mineflayer bots automatically place and destroy end crystals. ### üè† [Homepage](https://github.com/LINKdiscordd/mineflayer-autocrystal) ## Install ```sh npm install mineflayer-autocrystal ``` ## Example ```js const mineflayer = require('mineflayer') const { autoCrystal } = require('mineflayer-autocrystal') function main() { const bot = mineflayer.createBot({ host: 'localhost', username: 'CrystalBot', }) bot.loadPlugin(autoCrystal) bot.once('spawn', () => { console.clear() console.log('Spawned.') bot.chat('/gamemode creative') bot.chat('/give @s end_crystal 500') }) bot.on('kicked', (reason) => { console.log(reason) main() }) bot.on('error', (reason) => { console.error(reason) main() }) bot.on('chat', async (username, message) => { if (username === bot.username) return switch (message) { case 'start': bot.chat('AutoCrystal enabled.') bot.autoCrystal.enable() break case 'stop': bot.chat('AutoCrystal disabled.') bot.autoCrystal.disable() break case 'holes': const holes = await bot.autoCrystal.getHoles() bot.chat(`Found ${holes.length} holes made out of bedrock.`) break default: break } }) } main() ``` ## Author üë§ **Link#0069** * Github: [@LINKdiscordd](https://github.com/LINKdiscordd) ## ü§ù Contributing Contributions, issues and feature requests are welcome!
Feel free to check [issues page](https://github.com/LINKdiscordd/mineflayer-autocrystal/issues). ## Show your support Give a ‚≠êÔ∏è if this project helped you! ## üìù License Copyright ¬© 2021 [Link#0069](https://github.com/LINKdiscordd).
This project is [GNU GPLv3](https://github.com/LINKdiscordd/mineflayer-autocrystal/blob/master/LICENSE) licensed. *** _This README was generated with ‚ù§Ô∏è by [readme-md-generator](https://github.com/kefranabg/readme-md-generator)_

methods.name: placeCrystal
methods.description: Places a crystal close to the position if possible

returns.description: A boolean if it worked or not.
A boolean if it worked or not
